languages.text: "Нам нужен предводитель. Нам нужен символ власти, что столетия вела кабал к процветанию и могуществу. Род Эзирраеш еще не пресекся — а значит, ему суждено вернуться. Опустошительная буря взывает к тебе".

traits.locale_text: "Нам нужен предводитель. Нам нужен символ власти, что столетия вела кабал к процветанию и могуществу. Род Эзирраэш еще не пресекся — а значит, ему суждено вернуться. Опустошительная буря взывает к своему новому архонту".

languages.text: "We need a leader. We need a symbol of the power that led the Kabal to might and prosperity for centuries. The lineage of the Aezyrraesh has not yet faded, which means it is destined to return... The Reaving Tempest is calling out to you."
languages.original_text: "Нам нужен предводитель. Нам нужен символ власти, что столетия вела кабал к процветанию и могуществу. Род Эзирраеш еще не пресекся — а значит, ему суждено вернуться. Опустошительная буря взывает к тебе".

traits.locale_text: "We need a leader. We need a symbol of the power that has led the Kabal to might and prosperity for centuries. The lineage of the Aezyrraesh has not yet faded, which means it is destined to return... The Reaving Tempest is calling out to you."

"We need a leader. We need a symbol of the power that has led the Kabal to might and prosperity for centuries. The lineage of the Aezyrraesh has not yet faded, which means it is destined to return... The Reaving Tempest is calling out to you."

"We need a leader. We need a symbol of the power that led the Kabal to might and prosperity for centuries. The lineage of the Aezyrraesh has not yet faded, which means it is destined to return... The Reaving Tempest is calling out to you."

"We need a leader. We need a symbol of the power that led the Kabal to might and prosperity for centuries. The lineage of the Aezyrraesh has not yet faded, which means it is destined to return... The Reaving Tempest is calling out to you."

"We need a leader. We need a symbol of the power that led the Kabal to might and prosperity for centuries. The lineage of the Aezyrraesh has not yet faded, which means it is destined to return... The Reaving Tempest is calling out to you."

languages.text: "Wir brauchen einen Anführer. Wir brauchen ein Symbol der Macht, das die Kabale über Jahrhunderte hinweg stark und reich gemacht. Die Blutlinie der Aezyrraesh ist noch nicht ausgestorben, und das heißt, dass sie zurückkehren wird ... Der plündernde Sturm ruft nach Euch."
languages.original_text: "We need a leader. We need a symbol of the power that led the Kabal to might and prosperity for centuries. The lineage of the Aezyrraesh has not yet faded, which means it is destined to return... The Reaving Tempest is calling out to you."

traits.locale_text: "Wir brauchen einen Anführer. Wir brauchen ein Symbol der Macht, das die Kabale über Jahrhunderte hinweg stark und reich gemacht. Die Blutlinie der Aezyrraesh ist noch nicht ausgestorben, und das heißt, dass sie zurückkehren wird ... Der plündernde Sturm ruft nach Euch."

languages.text: “我们需要一位领袖。我们需要力量的象征，这种力量曾带领我们的阴谋团实现了长达数个世纪的繁荣。艾泽拉什的血统还没有泯灭，这意味着它注定会卷土重来……狂风在呼唤你。”
languages.original_text: "We need a leader. We need a symbol of the power that led the Kabal to might and prosperity for centuries. The lineage of the Aezyrraesh has not yet faded, which means it is destined to return... The Reaving Tempest is calling out to you."

traits.locale_text: “我们需要一位领袖。我们需要力量的象征，这种力量曾带领我们的阴谋团实现了长达数个世纪的繁荣。艾泽拉什的血统还没有泯灭，这意味着它注定会卷土重来……狂风在呼唤你。”

languages.text: « Nous avons besoin d'un chef. D'un symbole de la puissance qui a conféré à la Kabale grandeur et prospérité pendant des siècles. La lignée des Aezyrraesh perdure, ce qui signifie qu'elle est vouée à revenir... La Tempête ravageuse vous réclame. »
languages.original_text: "We need a leader. We need a symbol of the power that led the Kabal to might and prosperity for centuries. The lineage of the Aezyrraesh has not yet faded, which means it is destined to return... The Reaving Tempest is calling out to you."

traits.locale_text: « Nous avons besoin d'un chef. D'un symbole de la puissance qui a conféré à la Kabale grandeur et prospérité pendant des siècles. La lignée des Aezyrraesh perdure, ce qui signifie qu'elle est vouée à revenir... La Tempête ravageuse vous réclame. »

languages.text: «Necesitamos un líder. Necesitamos un símbolo del poder que llevó a la Kábala a una posición de fuerza y prosperidad durante siglos. El linaje de los Aezyrraesh aún existe, por lo que su destino es volver... La Tempestad Asoladora te llama».
languages.original_text: "We need a leader. We need a symbol of the power that led the Kabal to might and prosperity for centuries. The lineage of the Aezyrraesh has not yet faded, which means it is destined to return... The Reaving Tempest is calling out to you."

traits.locale_text: «Necesitamos un líder. Necesitamos un símbolo del poder que llevó a la Kábala a una posición de fuerza y prosperidad durante siglos. El linaje de los Aezyrraesh aún existe, por lo que su destino es volver... La Tempestad Asoladora te llama».

languages.text: 「我々にはリーダーが必要だ。何世紀にも渡って権力と繁栄に陰謀団を導いてくれるような力の象徴が必要だ。アエジレシュの血統はまだ消えていない。それは戻ってくる運命にある…リーヴィング・テンペストがあなたを呼び寄せているんだ」
languages.original_text: "We need a leader. We need a symbol of the power that led the Kabal to might and prosperity for centuries. The lineage of the Aezyrraesh has not yet faded, which means it is destined to return... The Reaving Tempest is calling out to you."

traits.locale_text: 「我々にはリーダーが必要だ。何世紀にも渡って権力と繁栄に陰謀団を導いてくれるような力の象徴が必要だ。アエジレシュの血統はまだ消えていない。それは戻ってくる運命にある…リーヴィング・テンペストがあなたを呼び寄せているんだ」

languages.text: "Bir lidere ihtiyacımız var. Kabal'ı yüzlerce yıl boyunca kudrete ve refaha ulaştırmış bir güç sembolüne ihtiyacımız var. Aezyrraesh soyu daha yok olmadı, bu da kaderlerinde geri döneceklerinin yazdığının göstergesi. Müfteris Kasırga seni çağırıyor."
languages.original_text: "We need a leader. We need a symbol of the power that led the Kabal to might and prosperity for centuries. The lineage of the Aezyrraesh has not yet faded, which means it is destined to return... The Reaving Tempest is calling out to you."

traits.locale_text: "Bir lidere ihtiyacımız var. Kabal'ı yüzlerce yıl boyunca kudrete ve refaha ulaştırmış bir güç sembolüne ihtiyacımız var. Aezyrraesh soyu daha yok olmadı, bu da kaderlerinde geri döneceklerinin yazdığının göstergesi. Müfteris Kasırga seni çağırıyor."
